attributes.action: State what contingency measures are in place to cope with Peak Oil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In todays Observer Gordon Brown has urged the world to control the price of crude oil.This creates the impression that the price is arbitary and manipulated. Is Gordon totally oblivous that we could be very close to Peak Oil and that if we are then we should expect considerable price tubulance.
